name: Luuk de Jong

structured_info.background: Luuk de Jong is a Dutch professional footballer born August 27, 1990, who plays as a striker. He is a four-time national champion and a 38-time international player, known for his experience, leadership, and goal-scoring ability. He recently rejoined PSV Eindhoven after a period with Sevilla.

summary: Luuk de Jong is an experienced Dutch footballer currently playing as a striker for PSV Eindhoven. He has a successful career with multiple clubs, including Ajax, Newcastle United, Borussia Mönchengladbach, and Sevilla, and is a proven goal scorer with consistent national team appearances.

name: Joop Munsterman

structured_info.background: Joop Munsterman is the Chairman of a football club and has been involved in transfer discussions, specifically regarding player Luuk de Jong. He has expressed dissatisfaction with comments made by de Jong.

summary: Joop Munsterman is a football club Chairman recently involved in player transfer negotiations and public relations issues with Luuk de Jong.

name: Steve McClaren

structured_info.background: Steve McClaren is a football manager who publicly voiced concerns regarding comments made by Luuk de Jong about a potential transfer, alongside Joop Munsterman.

summary: Steve McClaren is a football manager known for recently commenting on transfer-related statements made by player Luuk de Jong.

name: Peter Herrmann

structured_info.background: Peter Herrmann managed Borussia Mönchengladbach during a phase of Luuk de Jong's career there.

summary: Peter Herrmann is a Football Manager who previously worked with Luuk de Jong at Borussia Mönchengladbach.

name: Lucien Favre

structured_info.background: Lucien Favre managed Borussia Mönchengladbach during a period when Luuk de Jong played for the club, overseeing 23 appearances by de Jong.

summary: Lucien Favre is a Football Manager previously associated with Borussia Mönchengladbach, notably during the time Luuk de Jong was a player there.
